text: Cynthia Gellibert (born 1971/1972) is an Ecuadorian politician. She was the acting Vice President of Ecuador from 29 March 2025 until 24 May 2025, replacing the elected-Vice President Veronica Abad. When she became vice president, it was controversial because not many people agreed on how Vice President Veronica Abad was suspended from her duties. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:1970s births
title: Cynthia Gellibert
